title: Early-stage biosynthesis of phenalinolactone diterpenoids involves sequential prenylation, epoxidation, and cyclization
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,1010-1016
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00138A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tyler A. Alsup, Zining Li, Caitlin A. McCadden, Annika Jagels, Diana P. Łomowska-Keehner, Erin M. Marshall, Liao-Bin Dong, Sandra Loesgen, Jeffrey D. Rudolf
The first key steps in the biosynthesis of the phenalinolactones were investigated using heterologous expression of four core genes that are conserved in this family of bacterial meroterpenoids.
